content: Palm Jumeirah at the Persian Gulf coast of Dubai (United Arab Emirates) features hotels and a huge waterpark. It was created from 7 million tons of rock blasted from nearby mountains. But preliminary massive dredging drastically changed the wave, temperature, and erosion patterns in the Persian Gulf and a whole square mile of coral was killed. Developers dropped two American fighter jets on the seafloor to create new reefs__no.0209, 2018. #Persiangulf #Mideast #coral
